Docs.summary: Security level indicates the robustness of the device's DRM implementation.

remarks.para: Security level indicates the robustness of the device's DRM implementation.

This member is deprecated. Not of any use for application development; please note that the related integer constants remain supported: #SECURITY_LEVEL_UNKNOWN, #SECURITY_LEVEL_SW_SECURE_CRYPTO, #SECURITY_LEVEL_SW_SECURE_DECODE, #SECURITY_LEVEL_HW_SECURE_CRYPTO, #SECURITY_LEVEL_HW_SECURE_DECODE, #SECURITY_LEVEL_HW_SECURE_ALL
